Class FontItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.AbstractItem
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.FontItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LegendLabels, PointLabels, ScaleLabel, Ticks, Title

    public class FontItem
extends AbstractItem
    Base object to map font options of globals.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
